Articles.Content:
After many, many...many tries, I\'ve come up with a more-or-less (mostly less) flyable AV-8B Harrier. Or something.

I recommend turning ASAS on for takeoff, 3/4 throttle. Once you\'re 30-40m off the ground, simultaneously increase throttle, and decrease nozzle swivel ( number 9 key) and off you go. Keep ASAS on if you don\'t have a joystick. This thing is about as aerodynamic as a one-legged pig otherwise.

Uses stock parts as of 15.2 plus 'Damned Aerospace' mod for the nozzle swivels. Keep a supply of curse words handy for extra maneuverability.

http://youtu.be/p29-wVUzNU8
Nice work! I have been developing all stock VTOL craft but this is great! Good work
I have some stock VTOL aircraft, but they just make me angry
